OUR TEAM

Healing Vancouver for over 30 years

As the longest running Naturopathic Clinic in Vancouver, our mission is to help our patients build a healthy foundation that will support them throughout life. We are led by seasoned doctors who believe in the traditional principles and restorative powers of naturopathic medicine.

LEARN MORE

A balanced approach to individualized healthcare

We blend modern and traditional medicine to help patients achieve their highest health potential. We know that everybody is unique so we take the time to listen and get a thorough understanding of your health. This allows us to pinpoint exactly what is out of balance which, in turn, helps us to create a customized treatment plan to support you on your journey to health, knowing that with the right support your body can create miracles.

LEARN MORE

Staying true to our roots

We’re a clinic that cares, one that has benefited from the wisdom and knowledge that comes with weathering the seasons and one that has stayed true to —and confident in— Six Naturopathic Principles and the foundations of health.

LEARN MORE

Get to know us

Welcome to the Vancouver Naturopathic Clinic, where your health is our passion. Our clinic is led by seasoned doctors who deeply believe in the power of naturopathic medicine. Let us show you around.

We look forward to welcoming you to our clinic and guiding you on your journey to better health.
